extendedInfo.description: Coinbase is a digital wallet that allows you to securely buy, use, and accept bitcoin currency.Updates in the app are instantly synced with your web account at Coinbase.com and across all other devices.  Funds are are stored securely online, so if you lose your phone your funds are still safe.  You can also remotely disable access from your phone if it is lost or stolen.Features:* Buy and sell bitcoin by connecting any U.S. bank account (buys happen instantly on verified accounts)* Send or request payment using an email address, QR code, or NFC* Pay zero transaction fees (Coinbase pays all bitcoin miner fees on your behalf)* When sending between Coinbase accounts, transactions confirm instantly and micro-transactions (as low as 0.00000001 BTC) confirm instantly* View exchange rates in one of 160 local currencies* Connect multiple accounts and easily switch between them* Set a pin code to protect the app if you don't use a screen lock on your phone* Remotely disable your phone's access if it is lost or stolen* View your balance with a home screen widget* Customer support is available for this app at http://support.coinbase.com  Bug reports and feature requests welcome.* The app is 100% open source and peer reviewed by the bitcoin community.  You can contribute or review the source code at https://github.com/coinbase/coinbase-android

reviews.title: A Superb Addition for any BitCoin Day Trader!
reviews.comment: Developers reached out to me about a major issue with their app with authentication. They responded with a fix and have since then taken great care with their app. I respect their ownership in a product as much as I love how well built the application is. Solid Work. Keep it up!
reviews.author: Mitchell Pash

reviews.title: The best BTC management service
reviews.comment: Updated: The login issue was resolved. The app is great, but the screenshot of the Buy Bitcoin screen hides the Coinbase Fee and Bank Fee. Those fees exist, so show them in the screenshot!
reviews.author: Jesse Wilson

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: Now it\'s getting somewhere
reviews.author: Luis Martinez

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Getting better
reviews.author: Ben Messmer

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: Johnny B

reviews.title: Blank white screen after I push authorize
reviews.comment: Did not work.   Developers fixed the problem.  Changed to five stars!
reviews.author: Marcus Parrish

reviews.title: Awesome. Just needs 1 more thing.
reviews.comment: This app has all the functions I know and love from the full website.  The only thing else I can ask for is a widget that lists the current average btc price on coinbase. Make this happen for +5 stars.
reviews.author: Seth Chupp

reviews.title: Great app, with attentive developer(s)
reviews.comment: I initially had an issue with the app, but a fix came in within days of reporting the bug. Good job! Really digging the app.
reviews.author: Codey Christensen

reviews.title: My main wallet, but I have a few gripes.
reviews.comment: The wallet is pretty good, and I like the idea of no transaction fees if the transaction is intranetwork, and I like being able to buy and sell btc from the app.  Now onto the problems from my POV. For tipping and micro-transactions it doesnt work very well bc of precision problems. I would also like the capability to tap into paper wallets, basically taking private keys and making the balance available to you.
reviews.author: joeseph rodrigues

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: White screen after login and won\'t go any further.
reviews.author: Gordon Smith Jr.

reviews.title: I wish I knew how this worked
reviews.comment: The problem that caused other people to give one star reviews (freeze on authentication) which they allegedly fixed, is happening for me. I would really like to be able to try out the app, but that\'s not happening until the problem is actually fixed. I sent an email to the developer a few days ago but I haven\'t heard anything, so the time has come to escalate the problem for them.
reviews.author: Nathanael Beal

reviews.title: Great app, great exchange
reviews.comment: Now that the bug has been fixed and I am actually able to log in successfully, this is a wonderful app and a convenient way to manage my Coinbase account
reviews.author: Donovan Moore

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Problem fixed by coinbase definitely a good crew working there
reviews.author: Mike Gee

reviews.title: Login broken
reviews.comment: Despite being able to log into the website just fine on Chrome for android, app seems broken and can\'t get past oauth authorization page.
reviews.author: Paul Stamatiou

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Android 2.3.4
reviews.comment: Can\'t authorize app. Just goes to a blank page.
reviews.author: Steve Koch

reviews.title: 2 factor auth not well thought out
reviews.comment: Opening the text message that contained my 2 factor auth token reset the login process to the beginning.  I was able to login only by watching carefully for the code to briefly flash in my notification area.
reviews.author: Shaun Kruger

reviews.title: Looks good, works well.
reviews.comment: At first I couldn\'t get logged in, but the developer fixed the problem and now everything is working fine. It\'s certainly way more secure than any \"security focused\" bank I\'ve ever used!  I can\'t create new addresses from the app, though.
reviews.author: Joshua Baker

reviews.title: A+++
reviews.comment: Keep up the good work
reviews.author: andy s

reviews.title: Solid, reliable, and full featured
reviews.comment: This does everything I want from an Android app, you can check your balance, transactions, buy, sell Bitcoin and even send Bitcoin to other people!  Coinbase is the trusted site for Bitcoin!
reviews.author: Barry Kwok

reviews.title: Coinbase rules
reviews.comment: Great service, great app.  Simple and straightforward.
reviews.author: Craig Hammell
